document_data.name: Triboar Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Triboar Trail''' was a trail that ran from the town of [[Triboar]] through to [[Conyberry]], and stretching to the [[High Road]] on the coast. The region around it was also called [[Triboar Trail (region)|Triboar Trail]]. It was sometimes called the  "Triboar Cutoff" or the "Cony Gap."
document_data.Notable Locations:
*'''[[Triboar]]''': This trading town at the eastern end of the Triboar Trail gave the road its name.
*[[Butterskull Ranch|'''Butterskull Ranch''']]: A farm five miles east of Conyberry.
*'''[[Conyberry]]''': Only ruins remained of this small farming village by the end of the 15th century DR.
*'''[[Phandalin]]''': A junction from the Triboar Trail led to the mining village of Phandalin a few miles south.
*'''[[Cragmaw Hideout]]''': A cave complex used as a base of operations by the [[Cragmaw tribe]] of [[goblins]]. From here, they ambushed travelers on the Triboar Trail.
*'''[[Wayside Inn]]''': This inn marked the western end of the Triboar Trail where the trail met the [[High Road]].[[Wizards RPG Team]] (September 3rd, 2019). "Storm Lord's Wrath", ''[[Dungeons & Dragons Essentials Kit]]'', [[Wizards of the Coast]].
*
